metadata.title: CVE-2024-47597 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handlingcomponents. An OOB-read has been detected in the functionqtdemux_parse_samples within qtdemux.c. This issue arises when the functionqtdemux_parse_samples reads data beyond the boundaries of the stream->stcobuffer. The following code snippet shows the call toqt_atom_parser_get_offset_unchecked, which leads to the OOB-read whenparsing the provided GHSL-2024-245_crash1.mp4 file. This issue may lead toread up to 8 bytes out-of-bounds. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.24.10.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
